item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Black Bear Saloon

Early bird special: domestic drafts and well drinks (excluding tall drinks & doubles) are FREE from 6pm to 7pm for the first 25 people to arrive.

After 7pm, it's $3 for each of:

- Domestic draft beer
- Call drinks*
- House wine
- Soda & juice drinks*

* does not include shots, Red Bull drinks, martinis, tall drinks or doubles

Your contact is: Ben (554-5144). See Ben for wristbands for the free and $3 drinks

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, all are welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Black Bear Saloon
